Uses of Class
com.burstly.conveniencelayer.BurstlyBaseAd

Packages that use BurstlyBaseAd
com.burstly.conveniencelayer Contains Convience Layer (CL) classes. 
 

Uses of BurstlyBaseAd in com.burstly.conveniencelayer
 

Subclasses of BurstlyBaseAd in com.burstly.conveniencelayer
 class BurstlyAnimatedBanner
          AnimatedBanner is used to handle the use case of a banner which is not always visible.
 class BurstlyBanner
          A default static banner ad placement which is attached to an activity and left visible and active during the life of the Activity
 class BurstlyInterstitial
          BurstlyInterstitial should be used with zones marked as interstitial zones in the burstly.com UI and will be launched in their own activity.
